summary: Diff implements several UI/runtime fixes aligned with the glitch-fix request (branding update to "MR.AI UMPIRE", theme toggle handling for system theme, interval/object-URL cleanup to mitigate timer/memory leaks), but some requirements—especially around removing/implementing placeholder components and comprehensive end-to-end QA outcomes—cannot be confirmed from the provided diff summary. The diff also introduces a number of unrequested stylistic/feature-like changes and a new project_state.json file.

missing_requirements.requirement: Perform an end-to-end QA pass of the app (camera/recording, upload, analysis playback, theme toggle, navigation/back flow) and fix any runtime errors, broken UI states, or obvious regressions found during manual testing.
missing_requirements.reason: While there are targeted fixes (interval cleanup in AnalysisView and object URL cleanup/back flow handling in App), the diff summary does not provide evidence that the full end-to-end QA acceptance criteria were verified (e.g., "App loads without console errors" in logged-out and post-Internet Identity login flows; full record/upload→analysis→back flow without blank screens across the app).

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove or implement empty placeholder components that are part of the current build (e.g., an empty component file), ensuring no blank/empty component renders appear due to placeholder files being imported/used inadvertently.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary mentions many component modifications and additions, but it does not show any explicit removal or implementation of previously empty placeholder component files, nor does it identify which placeholders existed and were addressed.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions multiple component changes but not placeholder removals/implementations)

hallucinated_features.description: Added a new top-level project_state.json metadata file tracking request items (AR-1..AR-7) and deployment/source-export notes.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any REQ; appears to be internal tracking rather than a glitch fix.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend expanded with camera mode defaults/types and camera mode endpoints/data stored with uploads.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on frontend glitch fixes/branding/theme and runtime issues; no requirement asked to add camera mode concepts or APIs to the Motoko backend.

hallucinated_features.description: Significant new/expanded anime/cricket visual theming and UI styling additions (overlays, extended Tailwind palette, animated effects, redesigned upload section/footer attribution).
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goal states no new major features or core scope changes beyond fixing glitches; large styling/theming enhancements are not explicitly requested by REQ-1/2/3.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced/expanded mock real-time decision generation logic for analysis playback (randomized verdict generation).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-1 mentions fixing playback/runtime issues and timers; it does not request new mock/AI decision-generation behavior changes. This could be scope expansion depending on prior behavior (not verifiable from summary).
